title: Cu(II) inhibited the transport of tetracycline in porous media: role of complexation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00210E, Paper
Chang Xu, Bo Gong, Shan Zhao, Xiao-Min Sun, Shu-Guang Wang, Chao Song
The coexisting Cu(II) inhibited the transport of tetracycline in the quartz sand mainly via electrostatic force and complexation. Strong van der Waals forces and coordination bonds between complexes and SiO2 lead to high adsorption energy.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
